channel.title: How do you create a client?
channel.description:
could someone either help me make a client for a 508, or point me in the right direction to where i should look. because I know how to edit servers and code them, but I haven't messed with a client before.
Please and thank you

item.title: How do you create a client?
item.dc:creator: @anitdragon13 anitdragon13
item.description:
@anitdragon13 wrote:

hi
i would recommend just downloading a client
and learn how to edit them from there

Read full topic
